location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter, dated 15 November 1815, enclosing a copy of a letter from Gideon Colquhoun, assistant in charge of the residency at Bussora [Basra] 13 November 1815 and including his reply to it. The letter also reports that John Hine, assistant at Baghdad, has requested cash.The enclosed letter from Gideon Colquhoun acknowledes receipt of a letter dated 21 October 1815 and confirms that a large portion of the money requested will be sent by the ship William Petree.
